creditline: Lent by the Wang Xing Lou Collection
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: organic decorated blue and white covered vase; designed after an earlier bronze vase style, tapered foot, teardrop body, raised ribs at sides and front and back, elephant trunk style handles, dog laying at top of cover; does not have a storage box
dimension: H.20 x W.12-1/4 x D.9-1/16 in. (overall)
title: Covered Vase
